title: Pilsen/Little Village Updated 1 Bed + 1 Den / 1 Bath with a bonus room
posting_body: Spotless 1 bedroom + 1 Den / 1 bathroom with a bonus room Unit in the Little Village neighborhood of Chicago for rent close to Marshall Square.

This newly rehabbed unit features a new kitchen with appliances, new hardwood floor throughout, a completely new bathroom and plenty of large windows in both bedrooms, living room and kitchen give this unit a perfect natural lighting throughout the day.
The laundry is 5 min walk on Cermak.
This unit is just a ten-minute drive to both I-290 and I-55 and walking distance to both the Kedzie Pink line CTA station and the 52 Kedzie & 19th Street Bus.
Our units require first month rent, a $325 administrative move-in fee, and a $30 application fee.
Tenants monthly income, rental history, and credit scores are used to review your application.
Credit scores of 600+ are ideal but willing to work with certain situations.
Pets up to 35 LB are welcomed,no aggressive breeds please
For more information or to schedule a showing please contact our leasing agent Lucy via text message at 773 877 9647 or email
